N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4244.8 - Underwriting criteria

State Regulations
(a) Information submitted will be evaluated by the corporation's standard
underwriting criteria, including but not limited to the following: (1)
the ability of the applicant to repay the
project loan; (2)
borrower must
display profitability or potential for such; (3)
performance ratio analysis must yield
satisfactory results, including: (i) sufficient liquidity; (ii)
sufficient cash flow to service debt; (iii)
reasonable leverage; (4)
there must be no tax judgments
in place; (5)
sufficient collateral
must be in place; (6)
credit checks
must be satisfactory; (7)
principals must display sufficient management ability; and
(8)
borrower should be knowledgeable of
market and industry. Notes
